quotes.text: You have the right to perform your duties, but not the fruits of your actions.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.text: Change is the law of the universe.
quotes.author: Krishna

quotes.text: A man is made by his belief. As he believes, so he becomes.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.text: The soul is neither born, nor does it ever die.
quotes.author: Krishna

quotes.text: Perform your duty and abandon all attachment to success or failure.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita
